attributes.action: Investigate the Charter breaches of the BBC and its blatant political bias.
attributes.additional_details: Too many examples to highlight but especially and most blatantly in reporting of the recent Shadow Cabinet reshuffle and deliberate orchestration of biased News stories
attributes.background: BBC in its News and current affairs programs have consistantly breached its charter by editorial interference especially in reporting.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
